comment: I took Prof Conyers for HS3960 and she is an amazing person, she is so sweet and understanding to everyone and her class is very easy. I believe we were only graded by 2 very simple papers, 3 online trainings, and the final exam. 10/10 would recommend taking her if you have the chance
I don’t care for this professor. She doesn’t come off understanding like she claims to be. Had her online and it was just annoying.
Professor Conyers makes class really enjoyable. She's always so nice and ready to crack jokes, anyway that she can. She is super easygoing and is super understanding if you have something come up.

Professor Conyers is an amazing teacher. She is so kind and funny. She makes sure everyone is prepared for the assignments due. She gives out study guides for the online tests. Just go to class and complete the assignments and you'll get an A.
